name: TROJAN (2023)
description:
State of surveillance - The Environment

Game the high-security-system to extract the strictly protected files.
The Nexus is guarded by many hurdles though!

Look out! - Sentinel

If you don't beware the monitoring, more hostile forces may be alerted.
Don't let the Sentinel destroy you!

Hitch a ride - Data Packages

Stow away on data packages to evade the Watchers gaze.

Become the taskmaster - Map Editor

Share your own parcours with fellow players by creating custom maps.
Challenges the community and face the tests they come up with!
